data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 11,909 believers in Ramanagara to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ramanagara, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Ramanagara, Karnataka, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary: On average, 88 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ramanagara, Karnataka, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ramanagara, Karnataka, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,057,556 who are far from you in Ramanagara, Karnataka, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Bedar (Hindu traditions) people might believe through him.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Ramanagara, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Ramanagara, Karnataka, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Ramanagara, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

location.name: Ramanagara
location.people_groups_list: Mundala, Amma Kodaga, Bedar Kare, Bedar Kakamundi, Ambalavasi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mundala (28,000), Amma Kodaga (2,000), Bedar Kare (107,000), Bedar Kakamundi (99,000), Ambalavasi (158,000)
